description: React functional component for the header section of a weather application, including search and add location functionalities.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: React functional component that displays the header with branding, search input, and buttons for searching and adding locations.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles the form submission for searching a location.

methods.name: addLocationClicked
methods.description: Handles the click event to save the current query as a location.
